PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2013-13272013-12-05,  ,  FIN,  , 
ActFederal-Provincial Fiscal Arrangements Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Federal-Provincial Fiscal Arrangements Regulations, 2007
PrecisRegulations Amending the FEDERAL-PROVINCIAL FISCAL ARRANGEMENTS REGULATIONS, 2007 in order to (1) support the legislative renewal of the four major federal transfer programs; (2) implement the set of technical changes announced for Equalization and Territorial Formula Financing (TFF); (3) clarify various aspects of the calculation of Equalization and TFF; (4) establish the timing of estimates and final computations of the Canada Health Transfer and Canada Social Transfer starting in 2014-15; and (5) update and rationalize the regulatory regime for the major transfer programs.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2013-0225 Publication Date: 2013-12-18
AttachmentsAttachment
